title: Elon Muskâ€™s xAI Sets Sights on $1 Billion Investment Surge
description: In a new development, Elon Musk’s pioneering venture, xAI Corp., the creator of the controversial Grok chatbot, is embarking on a mission to secure a colossal $1 billion from investors. This ambitious move was unveiled through a filing with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission, signaling xAI’s intent to assert itself as a major player ... Read more
